title: Sh*t Show Podcast: The Jewel of the Nile (1985)

media:group.media:title: Sh*t Show Podcast: The Jewel of the Nile (1985)
media:group.media:description:
Romancing a second stone is hard. Let’s talk about how difficult it was to make The Jewel of the Nile, from suing Kathleen Turner $25 million to star, to Michael Douglas’ endless problems in the Moroccan desert.

You can also listen to this episode (and more) in podcast form!
You can watch the full video version of this episode on YouTube!

Follow us on Twitter and Instagram: https://linktr.ee/itwasashtshow
Follow us on Twitter and Instagram, and subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://linktr.ee/itwasashtshow
Follow us on Twitter and Instagram, and subscribe to our YouTube channel!

In the entertainment world, there are millions of dollars on the line and troubled productions are bound to happen. And we are going to talk about these disastrous, never ending, and sometimes dangerous productions. From the creators of WTF Happened To This Movie?, It Was A Sh*t Show is a video essay/documentary/podcast series looking at some of your favorite films and tv shows, and why they were such a nightmare to make.

Chapters:
00:00 - Teaser
01:23 - Intro
08:32 - The Jewel of the Nile (1985)
